titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide for certain transportation and subsistence in cases where district courts are holding special sessions as a result of emergency conditions.

bill.summary: Amends the Federal Judiciary Emergency Special Sessions Act of 2005 to require a district court holding special sessions due to emergency conditions to provide for certain prisoner transportation and subsistence allowances.
